title: Sci-Fi Creature Voices
description: A pack of 100 creature voice sound effects, including 17 kinds, such as alien, demon, swampy, goblin, ghost, spider, predator, troll, parasite, and others.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/scifi-creature-voices-short-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qln2b900vfczk1c/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Creature%20Voices_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection with a wide variety of sound effects designed to bring the action, attack and pain of creatures to life in game projects, animations and videos, which includes 17 types of monsters with unique voices for each creature.


The package contains a total of 100 creature voice sounds, including:

  1. Alien
  2. Critter
  3. Demon
  4. Ethereal
  5. Ghost
  6. Goblin
  7. Golem
  8. Insectoid
  9. Nightmare
  10. Parasite
  11. Predator
  12. Rat
  13. Reptile
  14. Sea Monster
  15. Spider
  16. Swampy
  17. Troll


The creature voices include clean sounds without additional processing, as well as designed sound effects with additional processing.


Universal sound pack is great for voicing creature attacks, actions and pain in sci-fi projects, as also in different strategy and tactical games in the Fantasy genre, role-playing projects, horror games.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 17 kinds of creatures
  • perfect for RPGs, Horror, Fantasy, Dark Fantasy, Sci-Fi


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 03 minutes 04 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
